doc.previous: This counts the pulses and adds them up to get traditional time units of seconds, minutes, hours, etc. It usually has a provision for setting the clock by manually entering the correct time into the counter.
doc.after: This displays the count of seconds, minutes, hours, etc. in a human readable form.
